:py:mod:`mocafe.expressions`
============================

.. py:module:: mocafe.expressions


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   mocafe.expressions.EllipseField
   mocafe.expressions.EllipsoidField
   mocafe.expressions.SmoothCircle
   mocafe.expressions.SmoothCircularTumor
   mocafe.expressions.PythonFunctionField




.. py:class:: EllipseField(center: numpy.ndarray, semiax_x: float, semiax_y: float, inside_value: float, outside_value: float)

   Bases: :py:obj:`fenics.UserExpression`

   Expression representing an ellipse with a given value inside and a given value outside. The user can set
   the semiaxes and the center.

   .. py:method:: eval(self, values, x)


   .. py:method:: value_shape(self)


   .. py:method:: __floordiv__(self, other)

      UFL does not support integer division.



.. py:class:: EllipsoidField(center: numpy.ndarray, semiax_x: float, semiax_y: float, semiax_z: float, inside_value: float, outside_value: float)

   Bases: :py:obj:`fenics.UserExpression`

   Expression representing an ellipsoid with a given value inside and a given value outside. The user can set
   the semiaxes and the center.

   .. py:method:: eval(self, values, x)


   .. py:method:: value_shape(self)


   .. py:method:: __floordiv__(self, other)

      UFL does not support integer division.



.. py:class:: SmoothCircle(center: numpy.ndarray, radius: float, inside_value: float, outside_value: float, slope: float = 100.0)

   Bases: :py:obj:`fenics.UserExpression`

   Expression representing a Circle with a given center and radius, with given values inside and outside the circle.
   The border of the circle is a smooth sigmoidal function with the given slope.

   .. py:method:: eval(self, values, x)


   .. py:method:: value_shape(self)


   .. py:method:: __floordiv__(self, other)

      UFL does not support integer division.



.. py:class:: SmoothCircularTumor(center: numpy.ndarray, radius: float, slope: float = 100.0)

   Bases: :py:obj:`SmoothCircle`

   Expression representing a circular phase field tumor with a given center and radius, which has value 1. inside
   the circle and 0. outside. The border of the circle is a smooth sigmoidal function with the given slope.

   .. py:method:: eval(self, values, x)



.. py:class:: PythonFunctionField(python_fun, *python_fun_params)

   Bases: :py:obj:`fenics.UserExpression`

   Expression representing a field with values determined on the basis of the given python function.

   .. py:method:: eval(self, values, x)


   .. py:method:: value_shape(self)


   .. py:method:: __floordiv__(self, other)

      UFL does not support integer division.
